title.zh: 南昌：如何利用AI做好公益
title.en: Nanchang: How to Use AI for Public Welfare

subtitle.zh: 章金媛志愿服务队线上分享
subtitle.en: Zhang Jinyuan Volunteer Service Team Online Sharing

description.zh: 左钰洁以“如何利用AI做好公益”为题，为章金媛志愿服务队成员作线上分享，探讨人工智能技术在公益事业中的应用，分享血友姐妹会在利用AI技术提升公益服务效率方面的经验和实践。
description.en: Yujie (Ruby) Zuo gave an online sharing session titled 'How to Use AI for Public Welfare' to members of Zhang Jinyuan Volunteer Service Team, discussing the application of artificial intelligence technology in public welfare and sharing the Hemophilia Sisters team's experience and practice in using AI technology to improve public welfare service efficiency.
